entropy.view

Interface SearchGoal


  • public interface SearchGoal
    Describes an objective variable to reduce. Creates a variable in a model and inject constraints linking this variable to its formal representation.
    can provide heuristics that MAY be used IFF the search request does not provide its own heuristics.
    Author:
    Guillaume Le LouÃ«t

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SearchHeuristic[] getHeuristics() 
      choco.kernel.solver.variables.integer.IntDomainVar getObjective(ReconfigurationProblem rp)
      Produces a formal expression of the objective variable in a model

    • Method Detail

      • getObjective

        choco.kernel.solver.variables.integer.IntDomainVar getObjective(ReconfigurationProblem rp)
        Produces a formal expression of the objective variable in a model
        Parameters:
        rp - the solver to add constraints into and extract global cost from
        Returns:
        the expression of the added formal cost of the model

      • getHeuristics

        SearchHeuristic[] getHeuristics()
        Returns:
        the heuristics associated with the objective to reduce. Can be null, or an empty array, if no heuristic is interesting.
